verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: When Joseph went to Egypt land

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: He wasn’t there alone,

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: He knew the Lord was there with Him,

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: though He was far from home.

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: In every task that Joseph had He

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines: did as He should though others meant

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines: to do Him harm, God meant it all for good ______ for good.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: God Is Good through every trial and test

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: God Is Good and I know His Way is best

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: Even when I cannot see the purpose of His plan

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: Still I understand God Is Good.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Endure each test God sends to you,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: and seek the Lord each day when things are tough,

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: God’s strong enough to help you find your way

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: Remember Joseph Trusted God, did the best he could

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: In every trial Joseph found, God meant it all for Good _______ for Good.

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: God Is Good through every trial and test,

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: God Is Good, and I know His way is best

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: Even when I cannot see the purpose of His plan, __( Still i understand 2x )

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: I understand that God Is Good through

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: every trial and test God Is Good, And i know His way is best,

verse.name: c1j
verse.lines: Even when i cannot see the purpose of his plan,

verse.name: c1k
verse.lines: Still i understand ____ God Is Good (Is Good)

verse.name: c1l
verse.lines: Still i understand____ God Is Good.
